name: Elf jump
description:
A simple 2d platform game I made to study game development. I created it thinking about going through the levels as quickly as possible, soon it ended up becoming a speedrun game.

Controls:
left: arrow left or key A
right : arrow right or key W
jump: arrow up or key D
space : restart level

Music: https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-theme-intensity
All the sprites in the game were made by me.
Made with Godot 3.3
